live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 10:01 PT.
59820.summary: Some customers in the Newton area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59820.title: Apr 6 - Surrey (Newton) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
